title: Rugged Garen Skin - Missing Particle-Effect
body:
Hi there!
I just noticed, that the Rugged Garen skin is missing an effect on his Ulti-Cast.
Normaly when he casts his ult, he sticks his sword into the ground, screams **JUSTICE!!!!** ,his sword begins to_** glow and shine**_ and the ulti pops up.
But Rugged Garen thinks: {{champion:86}} _Who the phuck needs that?_ {{champion:86}}  And just stick his sword into the ground and his ult pops up. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
It's maybe not a real bug/problem or something, but it's an missing effect and it makes the Rugged Garen Skin a bit worse to me than other skins. So please notice me Rito-SENPAAAI and let his cute little sword shine too. :3

replies.body:
Hey SinRall,

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see why his sword's no longer glowing.

No problem!
I hope you'll let his sword shine brighter than a bright sword can shine! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
